column4: Thanks. Finally found the file I needed. Seems my download was bad.
If your download is mostly good you can download only the bad bits via zsync
It would be an idea to have a link to the md5/sha1sum files on the main download page that one gets to from the main page of the Ubuntu site
ok. I don't have that. I'm on a high speed link so it doesn't take that long to get the full ISO image.
